content.rendered:
Directed by Vinil Mathew

Written by Kanika Dhillon. Kanika Dhillon. Kanika Dhillon

Cast Taapsee Pannu(Rani). Vikrant Massey(Rishu). Harshvardhan Rane(Neel). Aditya Srivastav(Kishore). Yamini Das(Lata). Dayashankar Pandey(Brijraj). Ashish Verma(Afzar). Anamika(Fatima). Gulista(Ruhina). Atul Tiwari(Senior Inspector). Deepesh Sumitra Jagdish(Navrangi). Mohd Ashique Hussain(Rastogi (as Ashique Hussain)). Alok Chatterjee(Gandhi). Preeti Singh(Bindiya). Sneha Kumar(Female Cop). Shyam Kishore(Mishra (as Shyaam Kishore)). Puja Sarup(Beena Mausi). Amit Thakur(Mr. Kashyap). Alka Badola Kaushal(Mrs. Kashyap (as Alka Kaushal)). N.K. Pant(Daddu Scene Man 1). Brahma Mishra(Daddu Scene Man 2). Abdul Ali(Butcher 1). Mohammed Faisal Shaikh(Butcher 2). Devendra Patel(Rickshaw Wala (as Devender Patel)). Nilofar Gesawat(Kishore’s Wife). Aishwarya Ojha(Meera). Nikhil Dixit(Roshan). Prakash Parida(Chaiwala). Rajesh Salvi(Non-dialogue Cop). Rajveer Singh Gour(Non-dialogue Cop). Rohit Singh Rajput(Non-dialogue Cop). Banfara Rafi(Lawyer). Chahhat(Munni). Sunita Khuslam(Rani’s Daadi (as Sunita Khuslani)). Parves Diwan(Rani’s Mama). Ranjana Vipin(Rani’s Mausi). Anjali Rahi(Rani’s Friend). Varsha Dangi(Rani’s Friend). Poonam Chaoudhary(Rani’s Friend). Kashvi Bharbhiya(Girl Kid). Maahir Raghuvanshi(Boy Kid). Vijay Rajoria(Boss). Vaibhav Kumar(Office Colleague 1 (as Kumar Vaibhav)). Himanshu Luthra(Office Colleague 2). Zeeshan Ali(Neeraj Khaitan). Emon Albira(Lover Boy). Siddhant Ghegadmal(Ajit). Kunj Anand(Neel’s Friend in Jwalapur (uncredited))

Language Hindi

Producers Vinod Bhanushali. Shiv Chanana. Kanika Dhillon. Swapnil Karhade. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Aanand L. Rai. Himanshu Sharma. Sonam Budha Sharmaa. Ashish Tandel.

Production Colour Yellow Productions.. Eros Worldwide. T-Series Films
